'''''nauro''''' (or ''ñaurō'') is the [[Quenya]] word for "[[werewolves|werewolf]]".<ref name=PE19>{{PE|19}}, pp. 106-107</ref><ref>{{LR|Etymologies}}, p. 377 (root ÑGAW-)</ref>

==Etymology==
*[[Sundocarme|Root]] [[NGWAW]]<ref name=PE19/>

==Cognates==
*[[Sindarin]] ''[[gaur]]''
